posts.cooked:
I’m trying to use the Phoenix Tuner X for our team project on my MacOS 15.4.1 (2020 Intel i5) even in the previous version (15.4) , and it crashed repeatly and throws these errors (i asked ChatGPT and it doesn’t give me any valid suggestions to me) below is the error details (it might be long, i just copied from the window)

can anyone help me fix the problem? i’ll provide more informations if needed thanks.

Process:               Phoenix Tuner X [9382] Path:                  /Applications/Phoenix Tuner X.app/Contents/MacOS/Phoenix Tuner X Identifier:            com.ctre.phoenix-tuner Version:               2025.3.2 (100) App Item ID:           6502530040 App External ID:       872137740 Code Type:             X86-64 (Native) Parent Process:        launchd [1] User ID:               501

posts.name: Fletcher
posts.cooked:
Start with reaching out to CTRE ’s support

There are many ways to contact CTR Electronics for support with robotics hardware and software. Our team of experts is here to help you!

And make sure to mention that you are an FRC team.

user_custom_fields.user_field_4: FIRST California | FTAA, CSA, A/V, and everything between.

suggested_topics.title: New Problem Pathplanner
suggested_topics.excerpt: When I use the Auto Chooser, my robot don’t do the commands.

suggested_topics.title: Programing issue with older robot
suggested_topics.excerpt: I would love to thank all of you very kind people I would have not been able to do it with you

posters.description: Original Poster, Most Recent Poster, Accepted Answer

suggested_topics.title: Advantage Scope Game Piece Visualization
suggested_topics.excerpt: Game pieces are visualized just like any other 3D object. You can publish a Pose3d or Pose3d from the robot program, and then drag the field to the poses list and choose the object type. For showing a…

suggested_topics.title: Phoenix tuner X showing devices as groups
suggested_topics.fancy_title: Phoenix tuner X showing devices as groups
suggested_topics.excerpt: Once you set the ID, you have to go back to the device list to select another device with ID 0, as the device you have open is now uniquely the device you gave an ID. So it’s basically select the devi…

suggested_topics.title: Pathplanner Auto
suggested_topics.excerpt: Hey everyone I am a programmer for team 5130. Recently we have been struggling at comp because of our autonomous. We manually coded our auto instead of using “pathplanner”. However, we realize that we…

data.title: [Help] Phoenix Tuner X repeatly Crashed on Mac
data.fancy_title: [Help] Phoenix Tuner X repeatly Crashed on Mac
